The Annetta Community was established by A.B. Fraser around 1880, when the Texas & Pacific Railroad was built through Parker County from Fort Worth. Mr. Fraser was originally from Nova Scotia, but emigrated to Louisiana and became an ardent Southerner.

[Click here](https://www.annettatx.org/history)





We have a responsibility to our community, we work hard to ensure long-term sustainability of our beautiful town. Â Town of Annetta does not levy Advalorem Tax.

[Click here](https://www.annettatx.org/sales-tax-history)
